entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:13 PM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:13 PM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023
